position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 2449, 'name': 'Hilton', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEHYnczCpQaAQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1654652249026/hilton_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=_IIZlP7PHgmyd78L8iMTeD54Amrg89uLLn1JV6FGKDk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/hilton/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Hilton', 'description': '•	Define and drive enterprise, brand, loyalty and experiential partnerships marketing multi-year strategy for the Asia Pacific. 
•	Lead fully integrated marketing campaigns across the region to increase brand equity and consideration by placing Hilton in culture in a relevant and timely manner through world-class partnerships. Bringing together music, sports, entertainment and brand-building.
•	Lead Hilton x WorldPride Sydney Partnership & Integrated Marketing Campaign (Partnership with Minus18 and Ruby Rose).
•	Lead Hilton x McLaren partnership marketing across Singapore and Melbourne races.
•	Work with the Global Marketing teams to contribute to the global strategy, brand identity, and develop purpose-driven campaigns for the Asia Pacific.
•	Partner with the Insights team to ensure that we keep our customers at the heart of our marketing.
•	Lead the development of the new brand platform “Hilton.For The Stay” across Asia Pacific markets. 
•	Lead the delivery of the highest quality consumer facing marketing campaigns that generates business impact.
•	Lead, coach, mentor a team of marketing experts in social, content, creative, loyalty marketing. Annual objective setting, priority & budget management, talent development, and performance management. 

Facilitate “Leading with Customer Impact” Workshops for the Marketing team.', 'title': 'Marketing Director - Enterprise, Brand, Loyalty and Partnerships, Asia Pacific', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Hilton', 'description': 'Lead women team member resource group to enable team members across corporate and hotels to grow professionally and personally. Drive awareness on how diversity empowers companies. Build an allyship network within the company.', 'title': 'Chair - Women Team Member Resource Group Asia Pacific', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Hilton', 'description': '•	Define and drive brand, social and content marketing multi-year strategy for the Asia Pacific.  
•	Work with the Global Brand Marketing, Social and Content teams to contribute to the global strategy, and brand identity, develop purpose-driven campaigns for the Asia Pacific, including marketing planning activities and campaign execution. 
•	Lead key marketing initiatives in the Asia Pacific (Hilton CleanStay, EventReady, and the launch of the new luxury brand LXR).
•	Lead social media strategy for the region, including building strategies for Hilton’s presence on Asia’s leading social platforms, such as LINE & WeChat.
•	Work with the Asia Pacific leadership team in-region to understand and address commercial performance goals for the business through marketing.
•	Partner with Media Strategy team to plan and implement media strategies within the Asia Pacific to achieve brand goals.
•	Collaborate with key partners and actively manage stakeholder relationships across the organization.
•	Lead Hilton’s Asia Pacific Women’s Team Member group to empower employees to advance their personal and professional goals.', 'title': 'Director of Brand, Social & Content, Asia Pacific', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Hilton', 'description': '•	Define and drive Hilton’s Enterprise social media strategy & social creative strategy in APAC and China.
•	Build social media strategy for Japan, including Hilton’s launch on LINE & Twitter. 
•	Build in-house social marketing team.
•	Manage social media marketing agencies.
•	Plan, drive and measure social media campaigns to drive brand awareness and bookings across Asia Pacific and China. 
•	Launch  Facebook DAT and prospecting in-language for 12 markets across Asia Pacific.
•	Build and maintain relationships with internal and external partners to drive best in class marketing initiatives, new product adoptions, creatives and tap into test & learn opportunities. 
•	Build strategic quarterly and annual plans, thought-leadership materials and success stories to be presented and shared across global and regional teams as well as senior leadership meetings.', 'title': 'Director of Social Media, Asia Pacific & China', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 68048591, 'name': 'Uncommon', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQE4HhQN9RVxfQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1630661743884/thisisuncommon_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=OTDq9XS0mg5GmtBiSjvCt2QsIHhBF634Zbyx975mOK4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/thisisuncommon/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Uncommon', 'description': None, 'title': 'Member', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Kafnu', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Kafnu', 'description': 'Kafnu - a lifestyle space brand which blends co-living, co-working, playing, learning and resting. •	Build in-house centralised digital marketing and creative content team.

Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, LinkedIn, Twitter, WeChat, Kakao.
•	Plan, Drive and Measure strategic creative brand awareness and performance marketing campaigns (driving bookings and revenue). Key campaigns include: Club InterContinental (9pts brand lift in SG), Little Big Travellers (5M millennial parents engaged), Booker Bonus Lead Generation (10x ROI), Hotel Indigo #StaySurprised (22.5K tweet engagements in SG in 1 day). Creatives, execution and results can be found in Media section.
•	Drive social innovation for IHG (launched Facebook Messenger Bots - first for IHG)
•	Drive mobile/social first creative transformation for IHG
•	Lead a team of 3 social marketing specialists 
•	Develop and lead Social Channels Centre of Excellence for the region to provide a central source of best practices, guidelines and advice on effective social campaign planning, implementation and performance review.
•	Consult senior stakeholders on new and innovative ways to achieve their business objectives via social – new products, test & learn opportunities, creative best practices.
•	Liaise with global and other regional (GC/EUR/AMER) social channels/marketing teams to ensure awareness of AMEA social marketing activities. Identifying opportunities for synergy or unique regional opportunities and jointly implement strategies and tactics to address these with the regional teams as well as knowledge transfer.
•	Maintain understanding of emerging trends, platforms and events in digital marketing space.
•	Continuously explore the extensibility of existing social platforms, services and tools to improve performance. 
•	Build strategic annual plans to be presented and shared across global and regional team.
